headline: Why Analysts See KLA's Story Shifting Amid Rising Valuations and New Growth Drivers
summary: KLA's consensus analyst price target has recently been raised from $929.68 to $972.48. This reflects greater confidence in the company's long-term valuation and prospects. This update comes as analysts weigh new opportunities for KLA, particularly on the back of supportive policy moves for domestic chip production. Stay tuned to discover how you can track these evolving expectations and stay ahead of changes in the stock's narrative. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst coverage of...
